docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Settings class.
Exception thrown from the Settings class.
Exception thrown from the Settings class regarding invalid settings arrays.
Creates an invalid settings exception.
Exception thrown from the Settings class regarding settings that are not present.
Creates a not found settings exception.
A general key-value store for user-supplied settings.
docblock.long-description: A [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductLine](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.ProductLine.html) and its dependencies can be configured in many ways by the user. The settings class provides a uniform interface for checking, reading and writing individual settings. For a description of the actual settings, see [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Settings.html).

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.
Creates settings.
Creates empty settings in the context of a directory.
Returns a path in the context of the settings' directory.
Returns the settings' directory.
Creates an instance of a class from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: If a string is given, the class is instantiated from a file. If an array("data" => ...) is given, the class is instantiated from a string. If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.description: Returns whether a plain settings array has a key.
docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting if a predicate is satisfied.
docblock.long-description: Throws [\FeaturePhp\InvalidSettingsException](../classes/FeaturePhp.InvalidSettingsException.html) if the predicate fails.

docblock.description: Returns an optional setting, defaulting to a value.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting in a plain settings array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: a setting path followed by the setting's new value

docblock.description: Sets a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting if it is not already set.
The FeaturePhp\Renderer class.
A minimalistic renderer for a web page.
docblock.long-description: This serves for visualizing and demonstrating the feature-php library. It is recommended to develop your own renderers in production.

docblock.description: Returns a simple stylesheet.
Echoes the renderer's web page.
Internal function for echoing the renderer's web page.
The FeaturePhp\File\File class.
A file generated for a product.
docblock.long-description: A file can be generated by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Generator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Generator.html) to be included by a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\Exporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.Exporter.html) in a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Product.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a file.
Returns the file's target.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\File\FileContent class.
A file's content.
docblock.long-description: Because different types of files are supported ([\FeaturePhp\File\TextFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TextFile.html) and [\FeaturePhp\File\StoredFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.StoredFile.html) in particular), file content is represented in its own class, not as a string.

docblock.description: Returns a summary of the file's content.
docblock.long-description: The summary should be suitable for an overview of generated files, but does not necessarily contain the complete file content.

docblock.description: Adds the file's content to a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html).

tag.name: param
tag.description: the file target in the ZIP archive

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\File\ChunkFile class.
A text file generated from multiple chunks.
docblock.long-description: A chunked file is a [\FeaturePhp\File\TextFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TextFile.html) generated by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\ChunkGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.ChunkGenerator.html). It contains some chunks of text in an undefined order. Optionally, a header and a footer can be provided.

tag.name: var
tag.description: whether to include new line characters after the header, footer and each chunk

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a chunked file.
Creates a chunked file from a chunk specification.
docblock.long-description: See [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ChunkSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ChunkSpecification.html) for details.

docblock.description: Adds a chunk to the chunked file.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\ChunkGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.ChunkGenerator.html). Only uses the text of the chunk specification.

docblock.description: Returns the chunked file's content.
docblock.long-description: The content consists of the header, then every chunk and then the footer.

docblock.description: Creates a file.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: Appends text content to the file.
Returns the file's target.
The FeaturePhp\File\TemplateFile class.
A text file in which specific parts may be replaced.
docblock.long-description: A template file is a [\FeaturePhp\File\StoredFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.StoredFile.html) which is assumed to have text contents. It has rules (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ReplacementRule](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ReplacementRule.html)) which specify parts of the file to be replaced, enabling simple feature-based templating systems.

tag.name: var
tag.description: rules to apply to the file content

tag.name: var
tag.description: a (relative) path to the file on the server

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a template file.
Returns the template file's content.
docblock.long-description: The content consists of the file content with every rule applied.

docblock.description: Creates a template file from a template specification.
docblock.long-description: See [\FeaturePhp\Specification\TemplateSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.TemplateSpecification.html) for details.

docblock.description: Creates a file.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: Creates a stored file from a file specification.
docblock.long-description: See [\FeaturePhp\Specification\FileSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.FileSpecification.html) for details.

docblock.description: Returns the file's target.
The FeaturePhp\File\TextFile class.
A file containing arbitrary text.
docblock.long-description: A text file may be manipulated, in contrast to a [\FeaturePhp\File\StoredFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.StoredFile.html). In particular, it may not be used for binary data such as images.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a text file.
Returns the text file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: Appends text content to the file.
Creates a file.
Returns the file's target.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\File\LogFile class.
A text file containing generator logs.
docblock.long-description: A log file is a [\FeaturePhp\File\TextFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TextFile.html) generated by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Generator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Generator.html). It contains a log of a generator's actions (in particular, generated files).

tag.name: var
tag.description: an array of array($artifact, $content)'s with logging information

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a log file.
Creates an entry in the log file.

tag.name: param
tag.description: a log entry may refer to an artifact

docblock.description: Returns the log file's content.
docblock.long-description: Tabular output is generated.

docblock.description: Creates a file.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: Appends text content to the file.
Returns the file's target.
The FeaturePhp\File\TextFileContent class.
A text file's content.
docblock.long-description: For text files we can store the whole file in a string.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the entire content as a string (usually UTF-8)

docblock.description: Creates a text file's content.
Returns the entire content as a summary.
docblock.long-description: This returns the whole text file.

docblock.description: Adds the text file's content to a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html).

tag.name: param
tag.description: the file target in the ZIP archive

docblock.description: Returns a summary of the file's content.
docblock.long-description: The summary should be suitable for an overview of generated files, but does not necessarily contain the complete file content.

docblock.description: Adds the file's content to a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html).

tag.name: param
tag.description: the file target in the ZIP archive

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\File\StoredFileContent class.
A stored file's content.
docblock.long-description: Because stored files may contain binary data, they are not read with the likes of file_get_contents.

tag.name: var
tag.description: a (relative) path to the file on the server

docblock.description: Creates a stored file's content.
Returns the stored file's path as a summary.
docblock.long-description: This returns no content of the stored file.

docblock.description: Adds the stored file's content to a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html).

tag.name: param
tag.description: the file target in the ZIP archive

docblock.description: Returns a summary of the file's content.
docblock.long-description: The summary should be suitable for an overview of generated files, but does not necessarily contain the complete file content.

docblock.description: Adds the file's content to a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only be a [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html).

tag.name: param
tag.description: the file target in the ZIP archive

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\File\StoredFile class.
A file stored on the server.
docblock.long-description: A stored file may contain arbitrary data (text files, images, ...) In contrast to a [\FeaturePhp\File\TextFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TextFile.html), it can not be manipulated and will be included in a product as is.

tag.name: var
tag.description: a (relative) path to the file on the server

tag.name: var
tag.description: the file target in the generated product

docblock.description: Creates a stored file.
Returns the stored file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: Creates a stored file from a file specification.
docblock.long-description: See [\FeaturePhp\Specification\FileSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.FileSpecification.html) for details.

docblock.description: Creates a file.
Returns the file's target.
Returns the file's content.
docblock.long-description: For details see [\FeaturePhp\File\FileContent](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.FileContent.html).

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Specification\ChunkSpecification class.
Settings for specifying a chunk of a text file.
docblock.long-description:
Chunk specifications are used by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\ChunkGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.ChunkGenerator.html) to specify a chunk of text for inclusion in a [\FeaturePhp\File\ChunkFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.ChunkFile.html). The chunk specification settings inside an artifact's generator settings hold a specific chunk of a chunk file and follow the structure: - root (object) - target (string) - the file target in the generated product - text (string) - a chunk of text to include in the target
The chunk specification settings in the product line's generator settings hold general settings for a chunk file and follow the structure: - root (object) - target (string) - the file target in the generated product - header (string) - header before all chunks - footer (string) - footer after all chunks - newline (bool) - whether to include new line characters after each chunk

docblock.description: Creates a chunk specification.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates a chunk specification from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: The settings context is taken into consideration to generate paths relative to the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the chunk's text.
Returns the chunked file's header.
Returns the chunked file's footer.
Returns whether to include new line characters after each chunk.
Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

Returns the entity's source.
Returns the entity's target.

If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

The FeaturePhp\Specification\ReplacementRule class.
Exception thrown from the ReplacementRule class.
Settings for specifying a replacement rule in a template specification.
docblock.long-description:
Replacement rules are used inside a [\FeaturePhp\Specification\TemplateSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.TemplateSpecification.html) to specify rules for replacing parts of a [\FeaturePhp\File\TemplateFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TemplateFile.html). The replacement rules settings follow the structure: - root (object) - from (string) - a string in the template file (exact match) - to (string) - a replacement string
or, alternatively: - root (object) - assign (string) - a variable in the template file with the form {{assign}} - to (string) - a replacement string
or, alternatively: - root (object) - regex (string) - a regular expression - to (string) - a replacement string

docblock.description: Creates a replacement rule.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Applies a replacement rule to a string.
docblock.long-description: Possible matching mechanisms include exact matches, Handlebars-style template variables and regular expressions.

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.

If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.description: Returns whether a plain settings array has a key.
docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting if it is not already set.
The FeaturePhp\Specification\TemplateSpecification class.
Settings for specifying a text file in which specific parts may be replaced.
docblock.long-description:
Template specifications are used by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\TemplateGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.TemplateGenerator.html) to specify a [\FeaturePhp\File\TemplateFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.TemplateFile.html) and its rules (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ReplacementRule](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ReplacementRule.html)). The template specification settings follow the structure: - root (object) - source (string) - a (relative) path to a template file on the server - target (string) - the file target in the generated product - rules (mixed*[]) - rules for replacing parts of the template (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ReplacementRule](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ReplacementRule.html))
mixed* means that a string, object or bool can be given according to [\FeaturePhp\Settings::getInstance()](../classes/FeaturePhp.Settings.html#method_getInstance).

docblock.description: Creates a template specification.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the template file's rules.
Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

Returns the entity's source.
Returns the entity's target.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.
Creates empty settings in the context of a directory.

If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

The FeaturePhp\Specification\Specification class.
Exception thrown from the Specification class.
Settings for specifying an entity relevant to a generated file.
docblock.long-description:
Specification settings are used by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Generator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Generator.html). The specification settings follow the structure: - root (object) - source (string) - a (relative) path to an entity on the server - target (string) - the target entity in the generated product
or, alternatively: - root (string) - specifies source as well as target
If either source or target is omitted, they share the same value.

docblock.description: Creates a specification.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the entity's source.
Returns the entity's target.

The FeaturePhp\Specification\DirectorySpecification class.
Exception thrown from the DirectorySpecification class.
Settings for specifying a directory recursively.
docblock.long-description:
Directory specifications are used by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\CopyGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.CopyGenerator.html) to specify all files in a directory tree. The directory specification settings follow the structure: - root (object) - source (string) - a (relative) path to a directory on the server - target (string) - the directory target in the generated product - exclude (string[]) - files to exclude from the specification
or, alternatively: - root (string) - specifies source as well as target
If either source or target is omitted, they share the same value.

docblock.description: Creates a directory specification.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates a directory specification from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: The settings context is taken into consideration to generate paths relative to the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the list of excluded files.
Returns the file specifications this directory specification applies to.
docblock.long-description: The entire source directory tree is considered, except for excluded files.

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the entity's source.
Returns the entity's target.

The FeaturePhp\Specification\FileSpecification class.
Exception thrown from the FileSpecification class.
Settings for specifying a single file.
docblock.long-description:
File specifications are used by a [\FeaturePhp\Generator\CopyGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.CopyGenerator.html) to specify a single file (in contrast to a [\FeaturePhp\Specification\DirectorySpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.DirectorySpecification.html)). The file specification settings follow the structure: - root (object) - source (string) - a (relative) path to a file on the server - target (string) - the file target in the generated product
or, alternatively: - root (string) - specifies source as well as target
If either source or target is omitted, they share the same value.

docblock.description: Creates a file specification.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates a file specification from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: The settings context is taken into consideration to generate paths relative to the settings.

docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Returns the entity's source.
Returns the entity's target.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.

Returns a path in the context of the settings' directory.

If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.description: Returns whether a plain settings array has a key.
docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

The FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings class.
Settings for a generator.
docblock.long-description:
The [\FeaturePhp\Generator\ChunkGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.ChunkGenerator.html) settings follow the structure: - root (object) - files (array) - see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ChunkSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ChunkSpecification.html)
The [\FeaturePhp\Generator\CopyGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.CopyGenerator.html) settings inside an artifact's generator settings follow the structure: - root (object) - files (array) - see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\FileSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.FileSpecification.html) - directories (array) - see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\DirectorySpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.DirectorySpecification.html)
The [\FeaturePhp\Generator\RuntimeGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.RuntimeGenerator.html) settings in the product line's generator settings follow the structure: - root (object) - class (string) - the runtime class name - target (string) - the runtime class file target in the generated product - getter (string) - the runtime class method for getting feature information
The [\FeaturePhp\Generator\TemplateGenerator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.TemplateGenerator.html) settings inside an artifact's generator settings follow the structure: - root (object) - files (array) - see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\TemplateSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.TemplateSpecification.html)

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates empty settings.
Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.
Creates settings.
Creates empty settings in the context of a directory.
Returns a path in the context of the settings' directory.
Returns the settings' directory.
Creates an instance of a class from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: If a string is given, the class is instantiated from a file. If an array("data" => ...) is given, the class is instantiated from a string. If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

The FeaturePhp\Generator\ChunkGenerator class.
Generates text files from multiple chunks.
docblock.long-description: A selected artifact can specify chunks of text to include in a [\FeaturePhp\File\ChunkFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.ChunkFile.html) (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ChunkSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ChunkSpecification.html)). In the product line's generator settings, more details about chunked files (such as header and footer) can be specified (see [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html)).

tag.name: var
tag.description: cached chunk files generated by this generator

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding deselected feature that specify this generator

docblock.description: Creates a chunk generator.
Returns the chunk generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Creates a chunked file from a chunk specification.
docblock.long-description: If the chunked file was already created, returns the cached chunked file.

docblock.description: Generates the chunked files.
docblock.long-description: Only chunk specifications from selected artifacts are considered.

docblock.description: Returns the class names of all generators.
Returns a map from all generator keys to class names.
Creates a generator.
Returns the generator's settings.
Registers an artifact whose corresponding feature is selected.
Registers an artifact whose corresponding feature is deselected.
Returns whether any artifacts are registered with the generator.
Generates the files for all registered artifacts.
docblock.long-description: If the files have already been generated, returns the cached files. The generator's log file is included.

docblock.description: Returns the generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Internal function for generating the files for all registered artifacts.
The FeaturePhp\Generator\RuntimeGenerator class.
Generates a file with runtime information.
docblock.long-description: An artifact can register a runtime generator to provide information about its corresponding feature (selected or deselected) at runtime. If used, a suitable PHP class is generated according to the product line's generator settings (see [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html)). (Only PHP is supported as of now.)

tag.name: var
tag.description: the runtime class file target in the generated product, defaults to "Runtime.php"

tag.name: var
tag.description: the runtime class method for getting feature information, default to "hasFeature"

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding deselected feature that specify this generator

docblock.description: Creates a runtime generator.
Returns the runtime generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Returns the JSON-encoded names of the corresponding features of some artifacts.
docblock.long-description: The JSON is assumed to then be enclosed in single quotes (').

docblock.description: Generates the runtime file.
docblock.long-description: Internally, this uses a template file and assigns the given variables. You can override this to add runtime information for other languages.

docblock.description: Returns the class names of all generators.
Returns a map from all generator keys to class names.

docblock.description: Returns the generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Internal function for generating the files for all registered artifacts.
The FeaturePhp\Generator\EmptyGenerator class.
Generates no files.
docblock.long-description: This generator is implicitly registered with any artifact that specifies no generators at all, i.e. one that has has no influence on the generated product. This way unused artifacts are logged and can be identified easily.

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

tag.name: var

docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

The FeaturePhp\Generator\CopyGenerator class.
Copies files and directories.
docblock.long-description: A selected artifact can specify files and directories that should be copied into the product unchanged. This enables file-level granularity. Directories are copied recursively, specific files can be excluded (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\FileSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.FileSpecification.html) and [\FeaturePhp\Specification\DirectorySpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.DirectorySpecification.html)). File contents are not inspected, so binary files can be copied as well.

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding deselected feature that specify this generator

docblock.description: Creates a copy generator.
Returns the copy generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Copies the files and directories.
docblock.long-description: Internally, this generates stored files (see [\FeaturePhp\File\StoredFile](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.StoredFile.html)) pointing to the original files on the server.

docblock.description: Returns the class names of all generators.
Returns a map from all generator keys to class names.
Creates a generator.
Returns the generator's settings.
Registers an artifact whose corresponding feature is selected.
Registers an artifact whose corresponding feature is deselected.

Generates the files for all registered artifacts.
docblock.long-description: If the files have already been generated, returns the cached files. The generator's log file is included.

docblock.description: Returns the generator's key.
docblock.long-description: The key is the name used to identify the [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html) for a generator.

docblock.description: Internal function for generating the files for all registered artifacts.

Generates a product's files.
docblock.long-description: A generator is used to automatically generate files for every registered [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Artifact](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Artifact.html) of a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Product.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

tag.name: var
tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding deselected feature that specify this generator

Returns a map from all generator keys to class names.

The FeaturePhp\Generator\TemplateGenerator class.
Generates text files by replacing parts of template files.
docblock.long-description: A selected artifact can specify template files and corresponding replacement rules (see [\FeaturePhp\Specification\TemplateSpecification](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.TemplateSpecification.html) and [\FeaturePhp\Specification\ReplacementRule](../classes/FeaturePhp.Specification.ReplacementRule.html)). The rules are applied to the template files to generate new, configuration-specific files.

tag.description: artifacts with a corresponding selected feature that specify this generator

docblock.long-description: Only template specifications from selected artifacts are considered.

The FeaturePhp\Model\XmlModel class.
Exception thrown from the XmlModel class.
A feature model represented in XML.
docblock.long-description: The XML syntax of FeatureIDE feature models is used. A short valid model might look like this: ``` <featureModel> <struct> <and abstract="true" mandatory="true" name="root feature"></and> </struct> <constraints></constraints> </featureModel> ``` It is recommended to generate a model using FeatureIDE's graphical feature model editor.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the XML element containing the root feature

docblock.description: Creates an XML feature model.
Creates an XML feature model from an XML file.
Creates an XML feature model from an XML string.
Traverses a part of the XML feature model's tree.
docblock.long-description: This is a preorder traversal (in particular, the root is visited first).

tag.name: param
tag.description: callback called with the current node and its parent

docblock.description: Traverses the whole XML feature model's tree.

tag.name: param
tag.description: called with the current node and its parent

docblock.description: Returns the XML feature model's underlying XML document.
Returns the XML feature model's root feature element.
Returns the XML feature model's cross-tree constraint elements.
The FeaturePhp\Model\Feature class.
A feature of a feature model.
docblock.long-description:
> A feature is a characteristic or end-user-visible behavior of a software system.
(from "Feature-Oriented Software Product Lines", see [http://www.springer.com/de/book/9783642375200](http://www.springer.com/de/book/9783642375200))
Here, it is essentially a name for some functionality that should be either included in (*selected* feature) or omitted from (*deselected* feature) a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Product.html). Features are usually related to other features through feature constraints (see [\FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.ConstraintSolver.html)). Every feature has a corresponding [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Artifact](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Artifact.html) that handles the details of product generation.

tag.name: var
tag.description: whether the feature provides an alternative choice

tag.name: var
tag.description: whether the feature provides a choice using an inclusive or

docblock.description: Creates a feature.
docblock.long-description: For the attributes "mandatory", "alternative" and "or" see [\FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.ConstraintSolver.html).

docblock.description: Returns the feature's name.
Returns the feature's description.
Returns whether the feature is mandatory.
Returns whether the feature provides an alternative choice.
Returns whether the feature provides a choice using an inclusive or.
Returns the feature's parent feature.
Returns the feature's child features.
Finds a feature by its name in a list of features.
Returns whether a feature is included in a list of features.
The FeaturePhp\Model\XmlConfiguration class.
Exception thrown from the XmlConfiguration class.
A configuration represented in XML.
docblock.long-description: The XML syntax of FeatureIDE configurations is used. A short valid configuration (for the example model at [\FeaturePhp\Model\XmlModel](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.XmlModel.html)) might look like this: ``` <configuration> <feature automatic="selected" manual="undefined" name="root feature"/> </configuration> ``` It is recommended to generate a configuration using FeatureIDE's graphical configuration editor.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the names of all selected features in the configuration

docblock.description: Creates an XML configuration.
Creates an XML configuration from an XML file.
Creates an XML configuration from an XML string.
Creates an XML configuration from a request variable.
docblock.long-description: For simple usage, the configuration can be read from GET, POST or cookie. A note on security: This function is safe to use in production scenarios (assuming the safety of the SimpleXML parser) because a configuration is always validated against the feature model.

tag.name: param
tag.description: whether to throw an exception when no configuration is present

docblock.description: Creates an empty XML configuration.
Returns the XML configuration's underlying XML document.
Returns the XML configuration's selected feature names.
The FeaturePhp\Model\ConfigurationRenderer class.
A renderer for a configuration and its model.
docblock.long-description: This renders a [\FeaturePhp\Model\Configuration](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Configuration.html) and its [\FeaturePhp\Model\Model](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Model.html) analysis as a web page. The model analysis includes a list of features and descriptions. The configuration analysis lists selected and deselected features and evaluates the configuration's validity.

docblock.description: Creates a configuration renderer.
Echoes the model and configuration analysis.
Echoes a model analysis.
Echoes a configuration analysis.
Returns a simple stylesheet.
Echoes the renderer's web page.
Internal function for echoing the renderer's web page.
The FeaturePhp\Model\Model class.
Exception thrown from the Model class.
A feature model for a software product line.
docblock.long-description: A feature model is a tree describing features and their relationships. Here, it is represented as a list of features and feature constraints ([\FeaturePhp\Model\Feature](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Feature.html) and [\FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.ConstraintSolver.html)). The underlying XML feature model has its own class, [\FeaturePhp\Model\XmlModel](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.XmlModel.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: a flat list of all features in the model

tag.name: var
tag.description: the root of the feature model tree

docblock.description: Creates a feature model.
Adds a feature from an XML node.
docblock.long-description: This is expected to be called only from the model's constructor through XmlModel::traverse().

docblock.description: Returns a feature in the feature model with a given name.
Returns the feature model's underlying XML feature model.
Returns the feature model's list of features.
Returns the feature model's root feature.
Returns the feature model's constraint solver.
The FeaturePhp\Model\Configuration class.
A configuration of a software product line.
docblock.long-description: A configuration is a set of selected features of a feature model, implying a set of deselected features as well ([\FeaturePhp\Model\Feature](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Feature.html) and [\FeaturePhp\Model\Model](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Model.html)). (Partial configurations are not needed on the server-side.) A configuration may be valid or invalid, this is determined by a the feature model's [\FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.ConstraintSolver.html). The underlying XML configuration has its own class, [\FeaturePhp\Model\XmlConfiguration](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.XmlConfiguration.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: the feature model the configuration relates to

docblock.description: Creates a configuration.
Returns the feature model the configuration relates to.
Returns the underlying XML configuration.
Returns the configuration's selected features.
Returns the configuration's deselected features.
Returns whether the configuration is valid.
Analyzes the model and configuration by echoing a web page.
The FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver class.
Exception thrown from the ConstraintSolver class.
A solver for feature constraints.
docblock.long-description: A [\FeaturePhp\Model\Model](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Model.html) can contain complex relationships between features that a configuration needs to satisfy. These relationships are represented as feature and cross-tree constraints, which in turn are represented as propositional formulas. A constraint solver extracts all constraints from a feature model and uses them to build a solver (i.e. a complex formula, see [\FeaturePhp\Helper\Logic](../classes/FeaturePhp.Helper.Logic.html)). This formula can then be evaluated for a [\FeaturePhp\Model\Configuration](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Configuration.html) to determine its validity.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the feature model the constraint solver relates to

tag.name: var
tag.description: formulas for all constraints from the feature model

tag.name: var
tag.description: one formula that validates all feature constraints

docblock.description: Creates a constraint solver.
docblock.long-description: Every feature constraint is translated into a formula using the semantics defined in Chapter 2 of "Feature-Oriented Software Product Lines" (see [http://www.springer.com/de/book/9783642375200](http://www.springer.com/de/book/9783642375200)). Every cross-tree constraint is already a formula and only needs to be transformed from an XML representation to a formula (i.e. callable). Finally, all formulas are conjoined to build a solver.

docblock.description: Returns the feature model the constraint solver relates to.
Returns formulas for all constraints from the feature model.
Returns one formula that validates all feature constraints.
Semantics for the root feature.
docblock.long-description: The root feature is always selected.

docblock.description: Semantics for a mandatory feature.
docblock.long-description: A mandatory feature is selected iff its parent is selected.

docblock.description: Semantics for an optional feature.
docblock.long-description: If an optional feature is selected, its parent is selected.

docblock.description: Semantics for a feature that provides an alternative choice.
docblock.long-description: Exactly one child of such a feature is selected.

docblock.description: Semantics for a feature that provides a choice using an inclusive or.
docblock.long-description: At least one child of such a feature is selected.

docblock.description: Transforms a cross-tree constraint from an XML rule to a formula.
Evaluates the solver for a list of features.
Returns whether a configuration is valid.
docblock.long-description: This is done by evaluating the solver for the configuration's selected features.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Artifact\Settings class.
Settings for an artifact.
docblock.long-description:
The [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Artifact](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Artifact.html) settings follow the structure: - root (object) - generators (mixed*) - an object from generator keys to [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html)
or, alternatively: - root (object) - an object from generator keys to [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html)
If no generator is specified, the empty generator is added automatically. mixed* means that a string, object or bool can be given according to [\FeaturePhp\Settings::getInstance()](../classes/FeaturePhp.Settings.html#method_getInstance).

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.
Creates settings.
Creates empty settings in the context of a directory.
Returns a path in the context of the settings' directory.
Returns the settings' directory.
Creates an instance of a class from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: If a string is given, the class is instantiated from a file. If an array("data" => ...) is given, the class is instantiated from a string. If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.description: Returns whether a plain settings array has a key.
docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting if a predicate is satisfied.
docblock.long-description: Throws [\FeaturePhp\InvalidSettingsException](../classes/FeaturePhp.InvalidSettingsException.html) if the predicate fails.

docblock.description: Returns an optional setting, defaulting to a value.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting in a plain settings array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: a setting path followed by the setting's new value

docblock.description: Sets a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting if it is not already set.
The FeaturePhp\Artifact\Artifact class.
An artifact associated with a feature.
docblock.long-description: An artifact is a representation of a [\FeaturePhp\Model\Feature](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Feature.html) with information on how to generate a product for which the feature is selected or deselected. This information is provided by a [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Settings.html) object.

docblock.description: Creates an artifact.
Returns the artifact's feature.
Returns the artifact's settings.
Returns the artifact's settings for all generators.
Returns the artifact's settings for a given generator.
docblock.long-description: Returns empty settings if no settings are specified for the generator.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter class.
Exception thrown from the ZipExporter class.
Exports products as ZIP archives.
docblock.long-description: This [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\Exporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.Exporter.html) takes a product's generated files and bundles them up in a ZIP archive on the server. To download the file, see [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\DownloadZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.DownloadZipExporter.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: the ZIP archive target file on the server

docblock.description: Creates a ZIP exporter.
Opens and returns the targeted ZIP archive.
Closes a ZIP archive.
Exports a product as a ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: Every generated file is added to the archive at its target path. If there are no files, a NOTICE file is generated because \ZipArchive does not support saving an empty ZIP archive. The archive's root directory has the product line's name.

docblock.description: Exports a product.
docblock.long-description: The implementation is expected to have some side effect, e.g. downloading a file.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Exporter\Exporter class.
An exporter for a product.
docblock.long-description: An exporter is responsible for providing a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Product.html) to the end user. For this it takes a product and its generated files ([\FeaturePhp\File\File](../classes/FeaturePhp.File.File.html)) and bundles them.

docblock.description: Exports a product.
docblock.long-description: The implementation is expected to have some side effect, e.g. downloading a file.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Exporter\DownloadZipExporter class.
Exception thrown from the DownloadZipExporter class.
Exports products as ZIP archives and offers them for downloading.
docblock.long-description: This [\FeaturePhp\Exporter\ZipExporter](../classes/FeaturePhp.Exporter.ZipExporter.html) exports the product to a temporary ZIP archive, offers it for downloading and finally removes the archive. It is suited to implement a "self-service" product generation service for the end user.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the ZIP archive target file on the server

docblock.description: Creates a ZIP exporter for downloading.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A directory suited for storing temporary files, if NULL, the global temporary directory is used. Writing permissions are required.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A prefix to assign to temporary files. Omitted in usual cases.

docblock.description: Removes the temporary ZIP archive.
Downloads the temporary ZIP archive.
docblock.long-description: This only works when no headers and no output have been sent yet, otherwise users receive corrupted ZIP files.

tag.name: param
tag.description: the name of the product line, used as the ZIP archive file name

docblock.description: Exports a product as a ZIP archive and offers it for downloading.
docblock.long-description: This only works when no headers and no output have been sent yet. Note that any occurring errors are ignored so that the downloaded archive will not be corrupted. There is currently no way to obtain error information in this case because feature-php does not have an external log file.

docblock.description: Creates a ZIP exporter.
Opens and returns the targeted ZIP archive.
Closes a ZIP archive.
Exports a product.
docblock.long-description: The implementation is expected to have some side effect, e.g. downloading a file.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Helper\XmlParser class.
Exception thrown from the XmlParser class.
Helper class for parsing XML files.
Parses an XML string.
Parses an XML file.
Returns a child node for a tag name from an XML node.

tag.name: param
tag.description: how many child nodes for the tag name are allowed

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\Helper\Path class.
Exception thrown from the Path class.
Helper class for handling file and directory paths.
Strips a base from a file or directory path.
docblock.long-description: If no base is supplied, the working directory is used.

docblock.description: Joins two file or directory paths.
docblock.long-description: If the left path is null, returns the right path, making the left path optional (see [https://stackoverflow.com/q/1091107](https://stackoverflow.com/q/1091107)).

docblock.description: Resolves a relative file or directory path.
docblock.long-description: This only works for unambiguous paths not depending on the working directory (e.g. ../test can not be resolved) (see [https://stackoverflow.com/q/20522605](https://stackoverflow.com/q/20522605)).

docblock.description: Returns whether a file path refers to the current or parent directory.
The FeaturePhp\Helper\_Array class.
Exception thrown from the _Array class.
Helper class for working with arrays.
Finds an array element by comparing a member with the given value.
Asserts that an array does not contain duplicates regarding a member.
docblock.long-description: Throws [\FeaturePhp\Helper\ArrayException](../classes/FeaturePhp.Helper.ArrayException.html) if duplicates are found.

docblock.description: Sorts an array in ascending order regarding a member.
The FeaturePhp\Helper\Logic class.
Helper class for propositional logic.
docblock.long-description: For simplicity, the logic is not general, but operates directly on lists of features (see [\FeaturePhp\Model\Feature](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Feature.html) and [\FeaturePhp\Model\ConstraintSolver](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.ConstraintSolver.html)). A formula is expressed by nested calls to the connectives, e.g. `Logic::equiv(Logic::is(...), Logic::is(...))`. Every formula (a feature constraint) is a closure expecting a variable assignment (a list of features). This way a complex formula can be built, stored and later evaluated for a given variable assignment.

docblock.description: Returns a formula that tests for the presence of a feature.
Returns a formula that is the negation of another formula.
Returns a formula that is the conjunction of other formulas.
docblock.long-description: Formulas can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a formula that is the disjunction of other formulas.
docblock.long-description: Formulas can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a formula that is the biconditional of two formulas.
Returns a formula that is the material conditional of two formulas.
The FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Settings class.
Settings for a product line.
docblock.long-description:
The [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductLine](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.ProductLine.html) settings follow the structure: - root (object) - model (mixed*) - a FeatureIDE feature model (see [\FeaturePhp\Model\XmlModel](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.XmlModel.html)) - name (string) - the name of the product line - defaultConfiguration (mixed*) - a FeatureIDE configuration used by default (see [\FeaturePhp\Model\XmlConfiguration](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.XmlConfiguration.html)) - artifactDirectory (string) - a directory with directories that are named after features and contain an artifact file - artifactFile (string) - artifact file used when an artifact directory is specified - artifacts (mixed*) - an object from artifact keys to [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Settings.html) - generators (mixed*) - an object from generator keys to [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Settings.html)
mixed* means that a string, object or bool can be given according to [\FeaturePhp\Settings::getInstance()](../classes/FeaturePhp.Settings.html#method_getInstance).

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings.
docblock.long-description: The directory may be used to resolve relative paths in the settings.

docblock.description: Creates settings from a JSON-encoded string.
Creates settings from a JSON-encoded file.
Creates settings.
Creates empty settings in the context of a directory.
Returns a path in the context of the settings' directory.
Returns the settings' directory.
Creates an instance of a class from a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: If a string is given, the class is instantiated from a file. If an array("data" => ...) is given, the class is instantiated from a string. If another array is given, the class is instantiated from that array. If true is given, the class is instantiated from an empty array.

docblock.description: Returns whether a plain settings array has a key.
docblock.long-description: If no settings array is given, the internal settings array is assumed.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting in a plain settings array.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Returns a setting if a predicate is satisfied.
docblock.long-description: Throws [\FeaturePhp\InvalidSettingsException](../classes/FeaturePhp.InvalidSettingsException.html) if the predicate fails.

docblock.description: Returns an optional setting, defaulting to a value.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting in a plain settings array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: a setting path followed by the setting's new value

docblock.description: Sets a setting.
docblock.long-description: A setting path can be supplied variadically.

docblock.description: Sets a setting if it is not already set.
The FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product class.
Exception thrown from the Product class.
A product of a software product line.
docblock.long-description: A product is a concrete variant of a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductLine](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.ProductLine.html). Its [\FeaturePhp\Model\Configuration](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Configuration.html) defines which features are selected and deselected. A product can be analyzed, generated (or derived) and exported automatically.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the product line that this product derives

docblock.description: Creates a product.
docblock.long-description: Throws [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductException](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.ProductException.html) if the configuration is invalid.

docblock.description: Returns the product's product line.
Returns the product's configuration.
Returns all generators.
docblock.long-description: The generators are instantiated with their respective generator settings.

docblock.description: Adds a feature's artifact to all generators it specifies.
docblock.long-description: This is done independently from whether the corresponding feature is selected or deselected to support generating code for both cases.

tag.name: param
tag.description: whether to add a selected or deselected artifact

docblock.description: Generates the product's files.
docblock.long-description: To do this, every artifact is registered with the generators it specifies. Then every generator generates some files. Finally all the files are merged.

docblock.description: Exports the product using an exporter.
docblock.long-description: Depending on the exporter, this has a side effect, e.g. downloading a file.

docblock.description: Analyzes the product by echoing a web page.
The FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductLine class.
A feature-oriented software product line.
docblock.long-description: A product line consists of a feature model (see [\FeaturePhp\Model\Model](../classes/FeaturePhp.Model.Model.html)), a set of artifacts (see [\FeaturePhp\Artifact\Artifact](../classes/FeaturePhp.Artifact.Artifact.html)) and instructions on how to generate a product from a configuration (see [\FeaturePhp\Generator\Generator](../classes/FeaturePhp.Generator.Generator.html)). All of these are provided using [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Settings](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Settings.html).

tag.name: var
tag.description: the settings object for the product line

docblock.description: Creates a product line.
Returns the product line's settings.
Returns the product line's model.
Returns the product line's name.
Returns the product line's default configuration.
Returns the product line's artifact for a feature.
Returns the product line's settings for a generator.
Returns a product of the product line for a configuration.
docblock.long-description: If the configuration is omitted, the default configuration is used.

docblock.description: The FeaturePhp\ProductLine\ProductRenderer class.
A renderer for a product.
docblock.long-description: This renders a [\FeaturePhp\ProductLine\Product](../classes/FeaturePhp.ProductLine.Product.html) analysis as a web page. In particular, a list of generated files and file content summaries is included.

docblock.description: Creates a product renderer.
Echoes the product analysis.
Returns a simple stylesheet.
Echoes the renderer's web page.
Internal function for echoing the renderer's web page.
